Name: Compass Example
Description: An example command 'example-compass' that shows how to span a compass window and change the direction it points.
Author: Rhien

AliasList.Command: #example;#echo "I will create a compass window in two seconds pointed {yeast{x.";#task-add -s 2 -c "#compass";#task-add -s 2 -c "#compass -d e";#task-add -s 4 -c "#echo I will move the compass to the {ysouthwest{x.";#task-add -s 5 -c "#compass -d sw";#task-add -s 7 -c "#echo I will move the compass to the {ynorth{x.";#task-add -s 8 -c "#compass -d n";#task-add -s 10 -c "#echo I will now close the compass.  This concludes the example.";#task-add -s 11 -c "#compass --close"
